title: r/Pettyrevenge How A Waitress Got Revenge Against A Rude Karen
description: r/Pettyrevenge In today's episode, a selfish Karen tries to scam a restaurant out of free drinks by claiming the drinks were made wrong -- after she finished drinking 95% of the drink. The bartender and waitress conspire to get some petty revenge by intentionally making her drink wrong this time around to see if the snobby customer would even notice. If you like this content, be sure to subscribe for more daily Reddit stories!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
